ComicInfo.Summary:
What If Bruce Banner Had Landed on Sakaar Instead of the Hulk?: Bruce Banner lands on Sakaar and is instantly killed; other heroes come to investigate one at a time and each of them are also killed.
What If the Hulk Landed on the Peaceful Planet That Reed Richards Promised?: The Illuminati's spacecraft delivers the Hulk to a peaceful planet. Although the Hulk and Banner seek different goals, they do ultimately find themselves content.
What If the Hulk Died and Caiera Lived?: After the Illumanti's spacecraft explodes on Sakaar and kills the Hulk, Caiera leads an invasion of Earth, murders the Illuminati, conquers and enslaves humanity and erects a monument to the Hulk's memory.
ComicInfo.Title: What If Bruce Banner Had Landed on Sakaar Instead of the Hulk?; What If the Hulk Landed on the Peaceful Planet That Reed Richards Promised?; What If the Hulk Died and Caiera Lived?
